exhibitsData.title: Dying Sun Photo
exhibitsData.description: Photograph of the dying sun taken by Denton Morris in the distant future.

exhibitsData.title: Time Machine
exhibitsData.description: The time machine created and used by Denton Morris in his travels through time. Unfortunately, is is not in working order.

exhibitsData.title: Denton Morris' Coat
exhibitsData.description: The coat worn by Denton Morris on his first trip to the future.

exhibitsData.title: Giant Crab Photo
exhibitsData.description: Photograph of a giant crab taken by Denton Morris in the distant future.

exhibitsData.title: Document #1
exhibitsData.description: Document recovered from the museum that Denton Morris encountered in his travels to AD 802,701. Unknown author.

exhibitsData.title: Document #2
exhibitsData.description: Document recovered from the museum that Denton Morris encountered in his travels to AD 802,701. Unknown author.

exhibitsData.title: Document #3
exhibitsData.description: Document recovered from the museum that Denton Morris encountered in his travels to AD 802,701. Unknown author.

exhibitsData.title: Giant Butterfly
exhibitsData.description: Carcass of a giant white butterfly encountered by Denton Morris in his travels to the distant future.

exhibitsData.title: Painting of Palace Exterior
exhibitsData.description: Painting recovered of the museum that Denton Morris encountered in his travels to AD 802,701. Unknown artist.

exhibitsData.title: Photo of Palace Interior
exhibitsData.description: Photo taken by Denton Morris of the museum he encountered in his travels to AD 802,701.

exhibitsData.title: Time Machine Schematic
exhibitsData.description: Original schematics for Denton Morris' time machine. Recovered from his study in the days following his disapearance.

exhibitsData.title: White Flower
exhibitsData.description: Flower given to Denton Morris by an Eloi that he grew close to on his first trip to AD 802,701.
